meanings.sent1: The eager dog foreran the pack during the race.
meanings.sent2: The scout foreran the group to ensure the path was safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel foreran the other animals to snatch the acorn.
meanings.sent4: The early morning sun foreran the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The falling leaves foreran the arrival of autumn.

meanings.definition: To go before; lead the way.
meanings.sent1: The brave knight foreran his comrades into battle.
meanings.sent2: The guide foreran the tourists through the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat foreran the family on their walk, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song foreran the singer's emotional performance.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh bread foreran the opening of the bakery.
